alert.note: Alert for Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 06 at 7:57PM EDT until May 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 188 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER DUVAL NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA ALACHUA BRADFORD COLUMBIA GILCHRIST UNION IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA CHARLTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, COLUMBIA, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GAINESVILLE, GAINESVILLE AIRPORT, HILLIARD, HOMELAND, JACKSONVILLE, KINGS FERRY, LAKE BUTLER, LAKE CITY, LULU, MACCLENNY, NEW RIVER, NEWNANS LAKE, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, ST. GEORGE, STARKE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, TRENTON, WATERTOWN, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
